title: Everyday
lyrics: Everyday
Joel Houston Tempo - 110 | Time - 4/4
VERSE 1
What to say Lord it’s You who gave me life and I
Can’t ex - plain just how much You mean to me now
That You have saved me Lord I give all that I am to You
That ev’ry - day I can be a light that shines Your name
INSTRUMENTAL
VERSE 2
Every - day Lord I’ll learn to stand upon Your Word
And I pray that I that I may come to know You more
That You would guide me in every single step I take that
Every - day I can be Your light unto the world
CHORUS
(world) Ev’ry - day it’s You I’ll live for
Ev’ry - day I’ll follow after You
Ev’ry - day I’ll walk with You
My Lord
BRIDGE
It’s You I live for ev’ry - day
It’s You I live for ev’ry - day
It’s You I live for ev’ry - day
ENDING
It’s You I live for ev’ryday
